page.title: 19Tourism.
page.content: The block is one which is frequented by tourists all the year round, but it is naturally at its busiest in the summer months when hordes of caravanners, sailors,fishermen,hikers and holiday- makers descend upon the area to enjoy the natural beauty on both land and water. Some caravan sites are for static caravans, whilst others are fields belonging to farmers for touring caravans and tents which provide temporary halts ranging from just one night to perhaps two weeks, but rarely longer. Other tourists stay in cruisers on the canal or yacht basin, or rent out cottages or houses.
